name: Absolute Schafkopf for Windows 11
description:
Schafkopf is a popular German card game and is played by young and old with great enthusiasm. "Absolute Schafkopf for Windows 11" is suitable for beginners and advanced players alike. Different difficulty levels and extensive adjustment possibilities are available.

The course of the game can be designed individually. Choose from different sets of cards (German and French leaf) or play with Bavarian card motifs. Special rules such as contra, wedding, Ramsch Rufspiel, etc. are also available.

Start now an exciting and challenging Schafkopf evening!

Features:

- Individual memory function
- Various special rules such as junk, short hand, contra, must play, reputation game and much more.
- Various card decks (German, Bavarian and French hand)
- Switchable game options
- Various coversheets, backgrounds and game tables
- Intelligent opponents
- Extensive game evaluation
